faq_items.question: How long will it take for my order to ship?
faq_items.answer: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days and shipped via standard delivery within 3-5 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout.

faq_items.question: Do you offer free shipping?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we offer free standard shipping on orders over $50. Free shipping is automatically applied at checkout when your order qualifies.

faq_items.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
faq_items.answer: Yes, you can change your shipping address within 24 hours of placing your order by contacting our customer service team. After 24 hours, we cannot guarantee address changes.

faq_items.question: What if my package is delayed or lost?
faq_items.answer: If your package is delayed or lost, please contact our customer service team with your order number. We'll help track your package and resolve any issues.

faq_items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers.

faq_items.question: Is my payment information secure?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your payment information. We never store your full credit card details on our servers.

faq_items.question: Do you offer installment payments?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we offer installment payments through our payment partners. Available options will be shown at checkout.

faq_items.question: What happens if my payment fails?
faq_items.answer: If your payment fails, we'll notify you and you can try again with a different payment method. Your order will be held for 24 hours to allow for payment resolution.

faq_items.question: What is your return policy?
faq_items.answer: We accept returns within 14 days of delivery. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original condition with all tags attached.

faq_items.question: How do I return an item?
faq_items.answer: Simply contact our customer service team for a return authorization, and we'll provide instructions for shipping the item back. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label for domestic returns.

faq_items.question: Are there any items that cannot be returned?
faq_items.answer: Yes, sale items, personalized products, and undergarments are non-returnable. These items will be clearly marked on the product page.

faq_items.question: When will I receive my refund?
faq_items.answer: Once your return is received and inspected, we will process the refund within 5-7 business days. The refund will be issued to your original payment method.
